creator: nicolaken@apache.org
text:
This patch adds the lenient property to the task so that it doesn't throw a
stacktrace if the property is not found.
It also adds the lang and util classes as default utility jxpath functions.

creator: nick@chalko.com
text: *** Bug 20272 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: peterreilly@apache.org
text:
The embed proposal is now obsolete, Matt's brilliant property helper has
provided an new and easy to use mechanism to do jexl. An antlib for this will be
available
soon.

Apart from the fact that I am not interested in this anymore (filed only 5 years
ago), this is a *jxpath* property helper, not jexl.

Oh well.
creator: nicolaken@apache.org
